meanings: 작별 Thank you for everything you've done for me.
작별 I appreciate everything you've done for me so far.
작별 I don't know how to thank you in words for what you've done for me so far.
만남 I'm sorry about not keeping in touch.
만남 Sorry about not calling you.
실용회화-가벼운 화제 How have you been doing?

vlive.korean: [그동안의 츄플다움이란?] [What were their previous songs like?] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 22. 서울대의 두 동아리 츄플 & 바팩 파이널에서 만나다!
[Q. 그동안 서울대 츄플 곡에 대한 평가는?] [Q. How do you think about previous songs by TRIPLE H?] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 22. 서울대의 두 동아리 츄플 & 바팩 파이널에서 만나다!
vlive.english: [Q. How do you think about previous songs by TRIPLE H?]

vlive.korean: 그동안 잘 있었나요? How have you been? 듣기 View video NCT : 🎂🎂🎂
여러분 그동안 뭐 했었어요? 잘 지냈어요? What have you been up to? Have you been well? 듣기 View video NCT : 답장 못해준 모든 시즈니 안녕 ^^
vlive.english: What have you been up to? Have you been well?

vlive.korean: 그동안 정말 한국에서 활동 많이 안 했잖아요? We haven't promoted in Korea very much, right? 듣기 View video NCT : 답장 못해준 모든 시즈니 안녕 ^^
vlive.english: We haven't promoted in Korea very much, right?

examples.korean: She was absolutely furious at having been deceived. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그동안 속아 온 것에 대해 그야말로 길길이 뛰었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was absolutely furious at having been deceived. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ve been so alone since you went away. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 떠난 이후로 그동안 난 너무 외로웠어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve been so alone since you went away. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Bob spent fifteen months alone on his yacht. Ann, meanwhile, took care of the children on her own. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 보브는 자기 요트에서 혼자 15개월을 보냈다. 그 동안에 앤은 혼자서 아이들을 돌보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Bob spent fifteen months alone on his yacht. Ann, meanwhile, took care of the children on her own. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Anne has been ill but now she’s back in circulation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 앤이 그동안 아팠지만 이제는 다시 활동을 하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Anne has been ill but now she’s back in circulation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: From what I can gather, there’s been some kind of problem. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 아는 바에 따르면 그동안 무슨 문제가 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: From what I can gather, there’s been some kind of problem. Add to Wordbook
